data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Describe the last time you heard about something that you thought was unfair. What did you learn from this situation? If you had the power to change it, what would you have done differently?
data.answer: This article is about the last time I heard about something that I thought was unfair. This thing was that my friend was discriminated against by other students because of his poor academic performance. Before this incident, I always believed that the quality of academic performance should not be used as a reason to discriminate against others. However, after my friend's experience, I was very disappointed with the performance of other students. I think it is too one-sided to evaluate a person's performance only from the perspective of academic achievements. An excellent person should have more good morality and a sense of responsibility. If I have the ability to change him, I will take him to study together and give him more academic help. （123）
